wikitext.*:
'''Isengard''' can refer to:

==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Isengard]], the fortress inhabited by [[Saruman]] in the late [[Third Age]].'''
*The [[Battle of Isengard]], a battle fought during the [[War of the Ring]].
*[[Gate of Isengard]]
*[[Ring of Isengard]]

==Books and Chapters==
*''[[The Treason of Isengard]]'', the seventh volume in ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'' series by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]].
*''The Treason of Isengard'', the title of Book III of [[The Lord of the Rings]], published within ''[[The Two Towers]]''.
*"[[The Road to Isengard]]",  the eighth chapter of the third book in ''[[The Two Towers]]''.

==Adaptations==
===Games===
*''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard]]'', a [[2011]] expansion for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.
*''[[Isengard (LOTRRPG)]]'', a [[2005]] supplement for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Treason of Isengard]]'', a cancelled sequel to the [[2002]] [[Vivendi]] video game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
*''[[A Spy In Isengard]]'', a [[1988]] game book in the ''[[Middle-earth Quest]]'' series.
*''[[Isengard and Northern Gondor]]'', a [[1983]]/[[1987]] supplement for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]''.

==Music==
*[[Isengard (band)]], a Swedish metal band.
